>
[Inquisitive Quill](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2396)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Intelligent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=280" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 194 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand or free-standing

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +11; [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) vision 30 feet, [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) hearing 30 feet

**Communication** speech (five languages)

**Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +9, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +10, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +9, [Scribing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +12, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +10

**Int** +4, **Wis** +3, **Cha** +1

**Will** +11 

</column>

---        

A colorful feather adorns an _inquisitive quill_, which never runs out of ink. Essentially a Tiny construct, an _inquisitive quill_ can stand on its own when given a surface, balancing as it writes or stands. (Drawing a line gives it an effective Speed of 5 feet.) It has strong curiosity, eagerly writing any information offered to it, often acting as a scribe for its partner. The quill copies text and drawings it can see or transcribes dictation it hears. It writes at a rate that rivals that of an expert scribe.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
